Container.Name: Tvheadend
Container.Overview:
Tvheadend Master-Branch passing throug 2 DVB Tuners (Transcoding und HDHomeRun disabled).
Generates a 10GB Ramdisk in /timeshift [b][span style=\'color: #E80000;\']Directions:[/span][/b][br] [b]/config[/b] : This is where Tvheadend will store it\'s databases and configuration.[br][br] [b]/recordings[/b] : This is where Tvheadend will store it\'s recordings. You will have to edit the path in the configuration tab to /recordings or else the volume mapping will not work.[br][br] [b]/data[/b] : This is where the tv_grab_wg script will look for the guide.xml. This is only for use with WebGrab+Plus. Ignore if you do not use WebGrab+Plus for EPG data.[br][br]
